4 from __future__ import print_function
5 from std_msgs.msg import Header
6 import tf2_ros
7 import rospy
8 import yaml
9 import os
10 
11 class TFCollector(object):
12  def __init__(self):
13 
14  rospy.init_node("tf_collector")
15  self.tf_buffer = tf2_ros.Buffer(cache_time=rospy.Duration(10.0))
16  self.tf_listener = tf2_ros.TransformListener(self.tf_buffer)
17  rospy.Subscriber("/extract_time", Header, self.time_cb, queue_size=100)
18 
19  self.n = 0
20  directory = "/media/usbstick/" + rospy.get_param("img_folder")
21  if not os.path.exists(directory):
22  os.makedirs(directory)
23 
24  self.f = open(directory + "/" + str(rospy.get_rostime().to_sec()) + ".yaml", "w")
25 
26  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
27  rospy.Rate(0.1).sleep()
28 
29  self.f.close()
30 
31  def time_cb(self, msg):
32  tf = self.tf_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link", "camera", msg.stamp, timeout=rospy.Duration(0.2))
33  rospy.logwarn("yaaay")
34  rospy.loginfo(str(msg.seq) + "\n" + yaml.dump(tf), file=self.f)
35  self.n += 1
36 
37 if __name__ == "__main__":
38  TFCollector()
